verbs.description: [V: attempted] [ARG1: murder] trial starts for mother accused of lying about son illnessattempted murder trial starts for mother accused of lying about son illness after a 2 year investigation a texas woman danita tutt faces a jury to determine her fate she is accused of lying about her son illness authorities say her 13-year - old son is not sick if convicted she faces life in prison child protective services danita murder danita tutt tutt colby attempted murder ronald mcdonald house cambridge philosophical society cps tutts
